title: Slate's Spoiler Specials: Miami Vice
description:
WARNING: This podcast is meant to be heard AFTER you've seen the movie. Slate movie critic Dana Stevens and staff writer Bryan Curtis discuss Miami Vice, starring Jamie Foxx and Colin Farrell and directed by Michael Mann.
        

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Slate Podcasts
itunes:subtitle: WARNING: This podcast is meant to be heard AFTER you've seen the movie. Slate's June Thomas and The Guardian's Oliver Burkeman discuss Scoop, the latest film from Woody Allen.
